description:
x509: export Cert field in UnknownAuthorityError.

Nothing in x509 uses it and it can be useful
for debugging.

messages.text:
Hello agl@chromium.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

The debug-ability of this code could certainly be improved, but I suspect that the addition of this member to the error was probably a mistake, rather than something that should be blessed as API.

CryptoAPI has an optional logging mechanism which is fairly good for debugging. I wonder whether something like that could be useful here.

I'd certainly have found something like that useful in my recent
delving. There are many moving parts, and it's not always
obvious (to me anyway!) how they fit together.
